name: Build-A-Body
description:
As a soul with no body, you must build the body you deserve by killing enemies in dangerous matches*. *No promise of dangerous matches

Controls: Mouse

Create chains of 3 or more tiles of the same type and press the "submit" button when ready. Press the "clear" button to clear your selection.

Tile types:

  • Heart - Heals you
  • Shield - You won't attack this turn, but the next attack against you will hurt less.
  • Sword - Melee attack
  •  Bow - Range attack
  •  Staff - Magic attack

If you manged to kill an enemy, loot will be dropped! Different loot have different modifiers, so experiment!

Want to change your equipment? You can do so after killing an enemy by clicking the "Inventory" button.

But be careful! If you die, you will be turned into a soul again and would have to start over.

Good luck!

Ps: We are aware that is not possible to equip weapons. Sorry about it :(
Pps: There is no win condition and the game might get stuck after visiting the inventory.
